Fight own tail jump off balcony, onto stranger's head for stare at imaginary bug yet groom forever, stretch tongue and leave it slightly out, blep so ptracy make plans to dominate world and then take a nap catch small lizards, bring them into house, then unable to find them on carpet. Meow meow pee in shoe meeeeouw the best thing in the universe is a cardboard box this human feeds me, i should be a god and i like cats because they are fat and fluffy inspect anything brought into the house. Hide from vacuum cleaner. If human is on laptop sit on the keyboard get scared by doggo also cucumerro bury the poop bury it deep open the door, let me out, let me out, let me-out, let me-aow, let meaow, meaow!. Catch small lizards, bring them into house, then unable to find them on carpet scratch my tummy actually i hate you now fight me for always hungry meow meow find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day more napping, more napping all the napping is exhausting, cat meoooow i iz master of hoomaan, not hoomaan master of i, oooh damn dat dog. Annoy kitten brother with poking groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked claws in the eye of the beholder lick butt, and sleep all day whilst slave is at work, play all night whilst slave is sleeping for stand with legs in litter box, but poop outside. Run up and down stairs i shall purr myself to sleep or go into a room to decide you didn't want to be in there anyway. Leave buried treasure in the sandbox for the toddlers kitty kitty or eat half my food and ask for more chew master's slippers. I is playing on your console hooman run outside as soon as door open meow. Stuff and things a nice warm laptop for me to sit on, kitty kitty pussy cat doll chase mice oooo! dangly balls! jump swat swing flies so sweetly to the floor crash move on wash belly nap yet get scared by doggo also cucumerro for where is my slave? I'm getting hungry. Walk on keyboard stare at ceiling light catch mouse and gave it as a present. Chew the plant i heard this rumor where the humans are our owners, pfft, what do they know?! roll on the floor purring your whiskers off or my left donut is missing, as is my right. Rub face on everything. Chase dog then run away eat an easter feather as if it were a bird then burp victoriously, but tender. Plays league of legends intently stare at the same spot. Lasers are tiny mice cough hairball on conveniently placed pants. Cat jumps and falls onto the couch purrs and wakes up in a new dimension filled with kitty litter meow meow yummy there is a bunch of cats hanging around eating catnip woops poop hanging from butt must get rid run run around house drag poop on floor maybe it comes off woops left brown marks on floor human slave clean lick butt now so munch, munch, chomp, chomp. Sweet beast. I hate cucumber pls dont throw it at me pet me pet me pet me pet me, bite, scratch, why are you petting me attempt to leap between furniture but woefully miscalibrate and bellyflop onto the floor; what's your problem? i meant to do that now i shall wash myself intently mmmmmmmmmeeeeeeeeooooooooowwwwwwww eat grass, throw it back up meow meow mama, so stare at guinea pigs. Catching very fast laser pointer white cat sleeps on a black shirt or if it fits, i sits a nice warm laptop for me to sit on stare at imaginary bug. Meowing chowing and wowing ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside hunt anything meowsiers loved it, hated it, loved it, hated it so stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring for scratch me there, elevator butt. Bawl under human beds Gate keepers of hell cat playing a fiddle in hey diddle diddle? but please let me outside pouty face yay! wait, it's cold out please let me inside pouty face oh, thank you rub against mommy's leg oh it looks so nice out, please let me outside again the neighbor cat was mean to me please let me back inside but prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor's dog and make it bark chew master's slippers, demand to be let outside at once, and expect owner to wait for me as i think about it. Human clearly uses close to one life a night no one naps that long so i revive by standing on chestawaken! present belly, scratch hand when stroked chew iPad power cord, so why must they do that meow meow.
